sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' const MovieList = (props) => { const { movies } = props const shorten = (text) => text.substr(0, 100) + '...' return ( { movies.map(movie => { return (

{movie.name}

{movie.genre}

{shorten(movie.description)}

{movie.rating}
) }) } ) } export default MovieList
